s: Summary: Invitation‑only stablecoin dinner featuring Kaia, Ratio and Liminal Custody, blending Hong Kong culture with high‑signal networking.
Topics: cross‑border FX on‑chain, stablecoin infrastructure, custodial compliance, DApp ecosystem scaling, regulatory harmonization.
Speakers: Kaia co‑founders, Ratio CTO, Liminal Custody CISO, selected stablecoin founders.
r: Gain strategic perspective on Asia‑centric on‑chain FX layers.
Secure partnerships with custodial providers meeting ISO 27001/27701 standards.
Influence roadmap of leading stablecoin platforms through direct dialogue.
